posts.postText: People on the server are changing names to freekill or freetranq and nothing can be done due to them stealing the name of others and if u slap them u slap the other guy the real guy. This needs to be worked on.

well, I'm upset, you should to. We need admin/mods playing in the server on the same time, only then we can play happily cuz they take action on the spot.

http://www.nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=21625#p21625

Nothing we can do. Unless, somebody felt trolled by my words. ( Someone huh? cant tell who is he / are they )..
People with sethhack can change their name every 100 milliseconds. Call an admin, there aren't any mods on jail cept balenti
Holy shit i remeber that!They kept stealing my name,chucks,and lots of other peoples names too!
